name: whiningly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a way of speaking) in an annoying way that shows that you are disappointed or unhappy: It is not helpful to complain angrily and whiningly about a child's behaviour. Instead of loudly and whiningly wishing that the problem would go away, why don't you do something about it?
More examplesFewer examplesIt's the kind of project that could be whiningly self-indulgent, but in fact it's quite absorbing. "Why should I do my homework? Every time I finish it, my teacher gives me more!" the boy said whiningly.
